/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and shops, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily life and movement in this part of the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
